Name: Idle Warrior
About the game: Idle Warrior is a little idle/clicker game in which you play an warrior who has to fight against an unlimited number of enemies. You can upgrade your warrior and unlock pets which help you in your fight with differen skills. Try to beat as many enemies as possible to get the strongest warrior of all
